data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Tarragona, Cataluña, Spain.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tarragona, Cataluña, Spain

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Tarragona, Cataluña, Spain.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Tarragona, Cataluña, Spain by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Tarragona, Cataluña, Spain will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of El Vendrell
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of El Vendrell, Cataluña, Spain.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Tarragona, Cataluña, Spain, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Over 22.69 percent of the people of Tarragona are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Tarragona, Cataluña, Spain from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

location.name: Tarragona
location.cities_list: Tarragona, Reus, El Vendrell, Tortosa, Cambrils
location.cities_list_w_pop: Tarragona (140,323), Reus (107,118), El Vendrell (35,821), Tortosa (35,143), Cambrils (32,422)
